statements: SELECT * FROM shared_boards;
SELECT board_name, created_at FROM shared_boards ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT board_id, board_name, owner_id FROM shared_boards WHERE topic_tags @> ARRAY['data_analysis']::VARCHAR[];
SELECT * FROM shared_boards WHERE owner_id = '73dab2fb-7cb9-4cea-81c3-70d92c0d9336';
SELECT board_id, board_name, created_at, topic_tags FROM shared_boards ORDER BY board_name ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM shared_boards WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT board_id, board_name, topic_tags FROM shared_boards WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT board_name, COUNT(*) AS board_count FROM shared_boards GROUP BY board_name;
SELECT DISTINCT owner_id FROM shared_boards ORDER BY owner_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT board_name, topic_tags FROM shared_boards WHERE topic_tags @> ARRAY['technology'] ORDER BY board_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM board_metadata;
SELECT board_name, board_id, created_at, last_modified FROM board_metadata;
SELECT * FROM usage_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT action, timestamp, user_id FROM usage_data WHERE board_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT board_name, created_at FROM board_metadata WHERE last_modified > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM board_metadata WHERE board_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT board_id, board_name FROM board_metadata ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT board_name, COUNT(*) FROM board_metadata GROUP BY board_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT board_name, COUNT(*) AS total_usage FROM board_metadata LEFT JOIN usage_data ON board_metadata.board_id = usage_data.board_id GROUP BY board_name ORDER BY total_usage DESC;
SELECT board_id, MAX(last_modified) AS latest_modified FROM board_metadata GROUP BY board_id;
SELECT * FROM board_metadata;
SELECT board_id, board_name FROM board_metadata ORDER BY created_on ASC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE board_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT topic_name, total_usage_count FROM popular_topics WHERE total_usage_count > 100 ORDER BY total_usage_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE action IN ('like', 'comment') ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM board_metadata WHERE board_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT board_name, created_on FROM board_metadata ORDER BY created_on DESC;
SELECT user_id, board_name, action FROM user_activity INNER JOIN board_metadata ON user_activity.board_id = board_metadata.board_id WHERE user_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7a8b-9c0d-1a2b3c4d5e6f';
SELECT topic_name, total_usage_count FROM popular_topics WHERE total_usage_count > 100 ORDER BY total_usage_count DESC;
SELECT board_id, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_activity GROUP BY board_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 3 ORDER BY total_users DESC;
SELECT * FROM board_metadata;
SELECT board_name, created_at FROM board_metadata WHERE board_name='example';
SELECT user_id, actions FROM board_usage WHERE timestamp>'2022-01-01';
SELECT username FROM user_metadata WHERE email='test@example.com';
SELECT board_name, topic_name FROM board_metadata INNER JOIN popular_topics ON board_metadata.board_id = popular_topics.board_id;
SELECT * FROM board_metadata ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT board_name, last_updated FROM board_metadata WHERE board_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM board_usage GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT board_id, topic_name FROM popular_topics JOIN board_metadata ON popular_topics.board_id = board_metadata.board_id;
SELECT * FROM board_metadata WHERE board_name ILIKE 'A%' ORDER BY board_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM BoardMetadata;
SELECT board_name, creation_date FROM TopicInsights WHERE board_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, duration FROM BoardUsage ORDER BY session_start DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM UserMetadata WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01' AND join_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT topic, popularity_score FROM PopularTopics ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM BoardMetadata LIMIT 5;
SELECT board_name, owner_id, creation_date FROM BoardMetadata WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT BM.board_name, BU.user_id, BU.duration FROM BoardMetadata BM JOIN BoardUsage BU ON BM.board_id = BU.board_id WHERE BU.duration > 60 ORDER BY BU.duration DESC;
SELECT UM.username, UM.email, BU.session_start FROM UserMetadata UM JOIN BoardUsage BU ON UM.user_id = BU.user_id WHERE BU.session_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT PI.topic, PI.popularity_score FROM PopularTopics PI WHERE PI.popularity_score > 50 ORDER BY PI.popularity_score DESC;
